chronowiki.title: Chrono Wiki
chronowiki.description: A free encyclopedia dedicated to Chrono Trigger, Chrono Cross, Radical Dreamers, and everything else related to the series. A long, rich history and a friendly, encouraging userbase makes this the best Chrono in the entire time/space continuum!

finalfantasywiki.title: Final Fantasy Wiki
finalfantasywiki.description: A new wiki focused on covering Square Enix's flagship franchise, the critically-acclaimed Final Fantasy series. The Final Fantasy Wiki was founded on January 12, 2020 as part of SEIWA and covers all things Final Fantasy and related franchises.

khwiki.title: Kingdom Hearts Wiki
khwiki.description: The Kingdom Hearts Wiki attempts to document all things related to the Kingdom Hearts series, from elements of storyline to gameplay. The site was originally founded on April 1, 2006 on Wikia and became independent on February 9, 2011. Since this time, the community of the KHWiki strives to be the most professional and comprehensive Kingdom Hearts resource in the world.

squareenixwiki.title: Square Enix Wiki
squareenixwiki.description: The Square Enix Wiki was founded on February 8, 2012, and is an up-and-coming wiki project created by SEIWA. It focuses on covering all things Square Enix, from its video game series to its physical publications to its most notable employees and work as a company.

strategywiki.title: StrategyWiki
strategywiki.description: StrategyWiki was founded in December 2005 by former member Brandon Suit with the idea that the existing strategy guides on the Internet could be improved. Three years later, in December 2008, Scott Jacobi officially established Abxy LLC for the purpose of owning and operating StrategyWiki as a community. Their vision is to bring free, collaborative video game strategy guides to the masses, including Nintendo franchise strategy guides.

twewywiki.title: The Wiki Ends With You
twewywiki.description: The Wiki Ends With You was founded on April 22, 2008 by DMZlol, and covers all things from Square Enix's action RPG series The World Ends With You, including the recent anime series! The wiki became independent on July 27, 2024, and boasts over 2,500 articles!
